main event: Two airmen observed a celestial object performing erratic maneuvers over Kadena Air Force Base in Okinawa on 22 July 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as an oval shape with a diameter estimated between 40 to 60 feet., The object left a light vapor trail lasting from 6 seconds to 2.5 minutes., It changed color from bright white to red-orange before disappearing., The airmen noticed the object moving almost stationary at very high altitude., No photographs were obtained, but investigation attempted photo coverage.
witness description: Two airmen stationed at the base
